title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1219/97 of 27 June 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 806/97 fixing the maximum amounts of compensatory aid relating to appreciable revaluations of the Irish pound, the pound sterling and the Italian lira occurring prior to 31 March 1997
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1219/97 of 27 June 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 806/97 fixing the maximum amounts of compensatory aid relating to appreciable revaluations of the Irish pound, the pound sterling and the Italian lira occurring prior to 31 March 1997
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amount of ECU 65,16 million in the second indent of Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 806/97 is hereby replaced by ECU 57,50 million.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 108, 25. 4. 1997, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 115, 3. 5. 1997, p. 16.
